Reviews.Title: Awesome Laptop and price
Reviews.Author: Luber Martínez
Reviews.Content: This laptop is perfect for anyone who wants a little bit more power and quality and the speed is perfect to process multiple programs

Reviews.Title: A decent everyday laptop
Reviews.Author: Wes
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop for my father and I would have to say that I have been impressed with the speed and overall design of the laptop. The layout of the keyboard works really well. It has all the standard ports that you would need: USB, HDMI...Lan. It's a pretty sleek and slim laptop which is why I like it. It's a great laptop for a home user or someone who just wants to browse the net every now and then.So here are my complaints about it: NO bluetooth on a laptop that should have this as a standard anymore. Battery life...sucks compared to others on the market today. Average battery time is about 3 hours. Most laptops are easily pulling 5-6 hours anymore. The hinges on the screen seem weak and like they'll wear out pretty quickly if you open and close it a lot. Also if you adjust the screen a lot for the touch part...I think that would wear them out faster.Other than that...not too many complaints. I think if HP were to fix these issues this would be a solid machine but it's a nice entry level computer into the touch market!

ProductInfo.Features:
15.6" diagonal HD BrightView Touchscreen
3rd generation Intel Core i3-3217U Processor
6GB DDR3L SDRAM (2 DIMM)
750GB 5400RPM hard drive with HP ProtectSmart Hard Drive Protection
Intel HD graphics 4000
ProductInfo.Name: HP Pavilion 15-n037cl 15.6" Touch Laptop, Intel Core i3-3217U, 6GB Mem, 750GB HD
